File.Title: Will RTS,S cure malaria?
File.HtmlText: The RTS,S malaria vaccine candidate is designed to reduce infection by Plasmodium falciparum, the most deadly species of the malaria parasite. RTS,S cannot be used to treat malaria. Anti-malaria drugs should be used to treat malaria once infection has occurred and this drug treatment needs to be initiated without delay to avoid serious consequences of the disease.
File.Topic: BACKGROUND INFORMATION ON MALARIA AND RTS,S
